story.paragraph1: My journey began in the world of motivational speaking, where I discovered the power of words to inspire and transform. For years, I traveled to companies across different industries, delivering talks on motivation, wellbeing, family values, and soft skills. This work taught me how to connect with audiences and drive meaningful change.
story.paragraph2: Building a successful speaking business that generated over $100K annually was incredible, but 2020 changed everything. When COVID-19 hit, I had to reinvent myself completely. That's when I discovered the digital world wasn't just the future‚Äîit was the present.
story.paragraph3: I channeled my sales expertise into copywriting and digital marketing, while simultaneously falling in love with JavaScript development. The same principles that made me successful as a speaker‚Äîunderstanding audiences, crafting compelling narratives, and driving action‚Äîtranslated perfectly to the digital space.
story.paragraph4: Today, ismaCopy represents the evolution of that journey. We don't just build websites or write copy‚Äîwe create complete digital experiences that transform how small and medium companies connect with their online audiences. Every line of code and every word we write is designed to perform and inspire.
